column4: I just installed Wubi Ubuntu on XP, and when I load it up, everything freezes except my mouse, which moves very slowly. ctrl-alt-bkspc, ctrl-alt-f1, etc doesnt do anything. I am on a tablet laptop, what do you think is wrong?

ctrl+alt+backspc has been disabled by upstream
